name: The Final (charlesurbro)
description:
It's the Stanley cup final in this 1v1 local multiplayer hockey game. Fight your way to victory in fast paced action, with beautiful goals and competitive fights.  Difficulty change and controls are in the settings. Thanks to Taylor J Glidden for player models   on   https://opengameart.org/content/hockey-players

First to 10 wins the game and the Stanley cup.
